promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong monkey fire-type pokemon with white fur. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pyroclysm, a a gigantic strong monkey fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Spreading Fire, Shining Fingers. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "fire" or "Pyroclysm". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, monkey-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Residing in molten realms, this colossal simian ignites anything it touches with its luminous digits. Its heat echos through the land.
